an6.21:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati sāmagāmake pokkharaṇiyāyaṃ.
an6.21:4.2: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ pokkharaṇiyaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.21:4.4: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho sā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an6.21:5.4: ime kho, bhante, tayo dhammā bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
an6.21:5.7: Atha kho sā devatā “samanuñño me satthā”ti bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
an6.21:6.1: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
an6.21:6.2: “imaṃ, bhikkhave, rattiṃ aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ pokkharaṇiyaṃ obhāsetvā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
an6.21:6.4: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho, bhikkhave, sā devatā maṃ etadavoca:
an6.21:6.8: ime kho, bhante, tayo dhammā bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattantī’ti.
an6.21:6.10: Idaṃ vatvā maṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
an6.21:6.11: Tesaṃ vo, bhikkhave, alābhā tesaṃ dulladdhaṃ, ye vo devatāpi jānanti kusalehi dhammehi parihāyamāne.
an6.21:7.1: Aparepi, bhikkhave, tayo parihāniye dhamme desessāmi.
an6.21:7.2: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an6.21:7.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
an6.21:7.7: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo parihāniyā dhammā.
an6.21:8.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atītamaddhānaṃ parihāyiṃsu kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi parihāyiṃsu kusalehi dhammehi.
an6.21:8.2: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, anāgatamaddhānaṃ parihāyissanti kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi parihāyissanti kusalehi dhammehi.
an6.21:8.3: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi parihāyanti kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi parihāyanti kusalehi dhammehī”ti.
